title: Zephyrhills Florida - Things to Do & Attractions
text: Zephyrhills Situated 30 miles northeast of Tampa, Zephyrhills is an eclectic, welcoming Pasco County community where visitors can find thrilling outdoor adventures, family-friendly festivals and events, and a downtown with a variety of popular eateries and independent shops. From skydiving over the lush West Central Florida landscape and whitewater paddling to relaxing with a craft beer at the brewery downtown, a trip to Zephyrhills is anything but dull. Thrill-seekers can get their fix at Skydive City, where first-timers can make tandem jumps or learn to skydive. Guests can also check out Skydive City’s events, and Jump Florida Skydiving, nine miles south of Zephyrhills in Plant City. At the Upper Hillsborough Tract of the Upper Hillsborough Preserve, visitors can spot wildlife, bike, hike, and ride horses along miles of multiuse trails, and fish on the Hillsborough River. Hillsborough River State Park in nearby Thonotosassa offers seven miles of hiking trails, tent and RV camping, kayak and canoe rentals, and scenic strolls along the river’s class II rapids. In town, visitors can see colorful murals and learn about the town’s railroad history at The Depot Museum, as well as visit the Barracks Museum at a former U.S. Army airfield where fighter pilots trained during World War II. When it’s time to eat, Sunrise Eatery, The Great Catch, and Plaza Mexico Mariscos Restaurant Bar & Grill are all popular choices. Zephyrhills Brewing, located downtown, is part of the Sports Coast Ale Trail and hosts a variety of food trucks. Visitors to Zephyrhills have easy access to a number of major West Central Florida attractions including Busch Gardens Tampa Bay and ZooTampa at Lowry Park, which are located within 30 miles of the city. Plan your trip to Florida’s Sports Coast. FAMILY FUN Check out the area’s family-friendly attractions. - Water Play interactive water park - Zephyrhills Skate Park - Pin Chasers - More family-friendly things to do MUSEUMS, ARTS & ENTERTAINMENT Visit the museums, see the city’s colorful murals, and watch the calendar for local events. OUTDOOR ADVENTURES Explore parks and preserves, spot wildlife, and hit the trails. - City parks - Upper Hillsborough Preserve - Skydiving - Agritourism - Birding - Beaches and water activities - Scalloping - Fishing and charters - More outdoor activities ACCESSIBILITY Check out the area’s accessible parks and attractions. DINING Stop in at a cozy cafe, seafood restaurant, or local brewery. SHOPPING Shop for gifts, vintage items, books, and more. SPORTS Hit the links and check out the many sports events happening in Pasco County. PET-FRIENDLY ADVENTURES Visit pet-friendly parks and businesses. PLACES TO STAY Book a stay at a local hotel or choose from a variety of accommodations in Pasco County. The historic buildings in... One Fun Day: Tampa Bay One Fun Day: Tampa Bay Q. Where is Zephyrhills, Fla. on a map? A. Zephyrhills is located in Pasco County, Fla. It is situated in the central part of the state, northeast of Tampa. You can easily find Zephyrhills on a map by looking for its coordinates at approximately 28.2336° N latitude and 82.1812° W longitude. The city is known for its natural springs and serves as a gateway to the scenic landscapes of central Florida. Q. How far is Zephyrhills from Tampa? A. Zephyrhills is approximately 30 miles northeast of Tampa. The drive typically takes about 45-55 minutes via I-275 N and US-301 N, depending on traffic conditions. This proximity makes Zephyrhills a convenient location for those looking to explore both the tranquility of a smaller city and the vibrant attractions of Tampa. Whether you're planning a day trip or a longer stay, the journey between these two cities is quite manageable. Q. How far is Zephyrhills from Orlando? A. Zephyrhills is about 75 miles west-southwest of Orlando. The drive usually takes around 1.5 hours via I-4 W, depending on traffic. This makes Zephyrhills a feasible option for those looking to explore Orlando's attractions while staying in a quieter, more relaxed setting. It's a great base for day trips to the theme parks and other attractions in the Orlando area. Q. What are the top attractions in Zephyrhills? A. Zephyrhills offers a variety of attractions for visitors. The Zephyrhills Museum of Military History is a must-visit for history buffs, showcasing military artifacts and memorabilia. For outdoor enthusiasts, Zephyr Park features a beautiful lake, walking trails, and picnic areas. Additionally, the city hosts several annual events and festivals that celebrate local culture and community. Q. What is the best time to visit Zephyrhills? A. The best time to visit Zephyrhills is during the spring and fall months when the weather is mild and pleasant. During these seasons, temperatures are comfortable, making it ideal for outdoor activities and exploring the city's attractions. The winter months are also a popular time to visit, as many people from colder climates come to enjoy the warmer weather. Summers can be hot and humid, but they are perfect for enjoying water-based activities. Q. Are there any family-friendly activities in Zephyrhills? A. Zephyrhills offers a range of family-friendly activities that cater to all ages. Zephyr Park is a great spot for families, featuring playgrounds, a walking trail, and picnic areas. The city also hosts various community events and festivals throughout the year that are perfect for families. For a unique experience, families can visit Skydive City to watch skydivers in action or even try tandem skydiving. Additionally, nearby attractions such as the Giraffe Ranch in Dade City provide educational and interactive wildlife experiences. Q. Are there any parks or nature trails in Zephyrhills? A. Zephyrhills is home to several parks and nature trails that offer opportunities for outdoor recreation. Zephyr Park is a popular destination with walking trails, a lake, and picnic areas. For those interested in hiking or biking, nearby Hillsborough River State Park offers scenic trails and the chance to explore Florida's natural beauty. The park also is home to Fort Foster State Historic Site , and offers canoe rentals and camping facilities. These outdoor spaces provide a great way to enjoy the sunshine and natural landscapes of central Florida. Q. Is there camping available near Zephyrhills? A. Yes, there are several camping options available near Zephyrhills. Hillsborough River State Park, located a short drive away, offers both tent and RV camping facilities. The park provides a beautiful natural setting with access to hiking trails and canoeing, and is home to Fort Foster State Historic Site . Additionally, there are several private campgrounds and RV parks in the area that offer a range of amenities. Whether you're looking for a rustic camping experience or a more comfortable RV setup, you'll find suitable options near Zephyrhills. Q. What is the closest beach to Zephyrhills? A. Clearwater Beach is located approximately 60 miles to the southwest. Known for its white sandy shores and clear blue waters, Clearwater Beach is a popular destination for sunbathing, swimming, and water sports. The drive typically takes about 1.5 hours via I-275 S, making it a feasible day trip for those staying in Zephyrhills. The beach area also offers a variety of dining and shopping options, ensuring a fun and relaxing day by the sea. Q. Are there any golf courses in Zephyrhills? A. Yes, Zephyrhills is home to several golf courses that cater to players of all skill levels. The Links of Lake Bernadette is a popular choice, offering a challenging 18-hole course set amidst beautiful scenery. Another option is Zephyrhills Golf Course, open since 1957 and committed to friendliness. These courses provide a great opportunity to enjoy a round of golf while taking in the natural beauty of the area. Whether you're a seasoned golfer or a beginner, you'll find suitable options in Zephyrhills. Q. How can I get around Zephyrhills? A. Getting around Zephyrhills is relatively easy, with several transportation options available. Many visitors choose to drive, as the city is well-connected by major roads and highways. Car rental services are available for those who need them. For those without a car, local taxi services and rideshare options like Uber and Lyft are also available. Additionally, the Pasco County Public Transportation (PCPT) system offers bus services that connect Zephyrhills to other areas within the county.
